Place0_Dialogue0_Case0.phrase: DR: Me compute, sorry for being a robot. Beep Beep!

Place0_Dialogue0_Case1.phrase: DR: we work TOO hard, i’m tired and my antennas are aching.

Place0_Dialogue0_Case2.phrase: DR: we work TOO hard, i’m tired and my antennas are aching.

Place0_Dialogue1_Case0.phrase: DR: It’s my antennas, i feel weird. You know that feeling when you’re in standby mode but still see and hear thing inside your processor.

Place0_Dialogue1_Case1.phrase: DR: It’s my antennas, i feel weird. You know that feeling when you’re in standby mode but still see and hear thing inside your processor.

Place0_Dialogue2_Case0.phrase: DR: I just feel like i’ve got a this feeling...

Place2_Dialogue0_Case0.phrase: Guard: Please stand still and await extraction.

Place2_Dialogue1_Case0.phrase: DR: Stop, it was my fault. I need fixing.

Place2_Dialogue1_Case1.phrase: DR: I’ll be back, I promise.

Place2_Dialogue2_Case0.phrase: Guard: Please stand still and await extraction.

Place6_Dialogue0_Case0.phrase: Guard: I got stuck here 294 years ago.

Place6_Dialogue0_Case1.phrase: Guard: Don’t be sorry. Be sorry for your friend. Friend is probably being led to the M.P.O.C right now. Ha. Ha. Ha.

Place6_Dialogue1_Case0.phrase: Guard: I was trying to catch one of them worker robots. They’re right in trying to get out of...Emotions detected, blockers engaged.

Place6_Dialogue1_Case1.phrase: Guard: Master Production Optimization Computer. It does NOT like robots feeling...Emotions detected, blockers engaged.

Place7_Dialogue0_Case1.phrase: Trucks go to package facility. No working robot may pass.

Place7_Dialogue1_Case0.phrase: Defect worker detected, please await extraction.

Place10_Dialogue0_Case0.phrase: No wait you're not one of the bad robots. Perhaps you can help me. This floppy disc i have here is the key to save us all. I was created with the sole purpose of inserting this disc inside the boss. I don’t know what this disc will do but it will work. Unfortunately tho since i’m quite old and weak i can’t fulfill my duty anymore. Please take this disc and insert it into the boss.

Place10_Dialogue0_Case1.phrase: That's exactly what robots say when they want you to calm down but then they take you! Please don’t hurt me!

Place10_Dialogue1_Case0.phrase: No wait you're not one of the bad robots. Perhaps you can help me. This floppy disc i have here is the key to save us all. I was created with the sole purpose of inserting this disc inside the boss. I don’t know what this disc will do but it will work. Unfortunately tho since i’m quite old and weak i can’t fulfill my duty anymore. Please take this disc and insert it into the boss.

Place10_Dialogue1_Case1.phrase: NO stay back! I’m warning you. I’m a master combat robot.

Place10_Dialogue2_Case0.phrase: No wait you're not one of the bad robots. Perhaps you can help me. This floppy disc i have here is the key to save us all. I was created with the sole purpose of inserting this disc inside the boss. I don’t know what this disc will do but it will work. Unfortunately tho since i’m quite old and weak i can’t fulfill my duty anymore. Please take this disc and insert it into the boss.

Place10_Dialogue2_Case1.phrase: Dang it you see right through me. I don’t actually know any combat at all. Don’t hurt me please!
